Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Specimen Container(s): Micro Test M4R Viral Transport Medium
Micro Test M5R Viral Transport Medium
Micro Test M6R Viral Transport Medium
Micro Test M4RTR Viral Transport Medium
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PLEX-ID Flu qualitative multiplex nucleic acid assay using RT-PCR and mass spectrometry for detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viruses from nasopharyngeal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative nucleic acid test to detect and differentiate influenza A H1N1 (2009), A H1N1 (seasonal), A H3N2 (seasonal) and influenza B in nasopharyngeal swabs from symptomatic patients; intended for use on the PLEX-ID System as an aid in diagnosis, not for detection of influenza C
